message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, considering its value to you is $10,000.  Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway, considering the value I place on the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,800 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,200. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I understand that you're willing to come down, Alice, but I'm still a bit far from your new offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm proposing $11,000. This is the highest I'm willing to go.
